documents.document: Need an activity stream for politics with a TL;DR summary, links to dive into details, and action list on how to get involved.
Confused that my Surface Pro 4 fan is spinning away - open task manager to find Slack and Chrome multiplying all over the place.
Let's hope Trump's plan to make America great again doesn't involve a civil war or world war.
Kids slept most of the 4 hour drive, downside is they'll be wired for at least two hours now while we try unpack.

Awesome morning with the team talking about the road ahead, leveling up, and how we individually and collectively play a part.

@Zendesk agent interface - looking to link to a particular search based on a specific tag. URL doesn't reflect current search parameters.
Can't believe that @ZenDesk doesn't have the ability to link to search results. Seems like web app 101 stuff.
@RBC_Canada @TD_Canada you know what would be awesome is a push notification a day before direct debit happens because ppl have busy lives.
Direct debit failed b/c money in wrong acct, each bank dings ~$50 NSF = ~$100 fee for a $188 payment. Merry xmas @RBC_Canada + @TD_Canada!
@getwired @Windows the missing piece to me is hard disk encryption. Had to upgrade to Pro to get it.

A modern day move for @Windows would be to include BitLocker in all editions of Windows.

With all the questions of who is dealing in facts I don't know where to turn for proper news anymore.
Google Now surfaced a news article which was scraped from another site which contained the full story but full of scammy pop-ups.
2016 will be the year we'll talk less about news org pay walls and how the credibility of the profession itself fell apart.
